name: 양정화
info:
• 别名: Yang Jeong-Hwa
  • 性别: 女
  • 生日: 1970-11-27
  • 血型: AB
  • 身高: 160cm
  • 引用来源: Namuwiki
  • 出生地: 韩国·釜山广域市
  • 毕业院校: 东亚大学
  • 事务所: Tooni Voice
  • 出道时间: 1995
  • 事务所资料页: http://www.toonivoice.com/sub/sub02_view.php?user_id=anast99
detail:
Jeong Hwa Yang has dubbed many foreign entertainment in Korean such as;

Azula from "Avatar the Last Airbender"
Ayumu Kasuga from "Azumanga Daioh"
Saber from "Fate/Stay Night"
Olivier Mira Armstrong from "Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood"
Seras Victoria from "Hellsing"
Hikaru Shindo from "Hikaru no Go"
Jakotsu from "InuYasha"
Lin Beifong from "Legend of Korra"
Keroro from "Sgt. Frog"
Fuu from "Samurai Champloo"
Suigintou from "Rozen Maiden"
Ranma from "Ranma 1/2"
Eclair Tonnerre from "Ouran Highschool Host Club"
Sweetie Belle, Granny Smith, and Princess Celestia from "My Little Pony"
Quatre Raberba Winner from "Mobile Suit Gundam Wing"
Hinata Shouyo from "Haikyuu!! Owari to Hajimari"
